commandobject.name: SpawnActor
commandobject.documentation: Will spawn an actor in the game specified by Type (holds the class of the actor). Be carefull with what you spawn and where you spawn it. Possible use - for some additional inventory spawns.

property.name: Location
property.documentation: Location where the actor will be spawned.

property.name: Type
property.documentation: Holds the desired actor class (e.g. xWeapons.FlakCannonPickup).
